var blockList = ['13958','1571','6275']

var replies = document.getElementsByClassName("mod-body aw-feed-list aw-replies")[0];
var nodes = replies.children;
for (var i = 0; i < nodes.length; i++) {
var node = nodes[i];
var UID = node.getElementsByClassName("aw-user-img aw-border-radius-5")[0].attributes['data-id'].value;
if(-1 != blockList.indexOf(UID))
{
replies.removeChild(node)
}
}
